channel.description: Recent content in Image Generation on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Through-The-Mask: Mask-based Motion Trajectories for Image-to-Video Generation
item.description: Through-The-Mask uses mask-based motion trajectories to generate realistic videos from images and text, overcoming limitations of existing methods in handling complex multi-object motion.

item.title: MagicFace: High-Fidelity Facial Expression Editing with Action-Unit Control
item.description: MagicFace achieves high-fidelity facial expression editing via AU control, preserving identity and background using a diffusion model and ID encoder, significantly outperforming existing methods.

item.title: Reconstruction vs. Generation: Taming Optimization Dilemma in Latent Diffusion Models
item.description: LightningDiT resolves the optimization dilemma in latent diffusion models by aligning latent space with pre-trained vision models, achieving state-of-the-art ImageNet 256x256 generation with over 21x …

item.title: Edicho: Consistent Image Editing in the Wild
item.description: Edicho: a novel training-free method for consistent image editing across diverse images, achieving precise consistency by leveraging explicit correspondence.

item.title: VisionReward: Fine-Grained Multi-Dimensional Human Preference Learning for Image and Video Generation
item.description: VisionReward, a novel reward model, surpasses existing methods by precisely capturing multi-dimensional human preferences for image and video generation, enabling more accurate and stable model optimi…

item.title: Bringing Objects to Life: 4D generation from 3D objects
item.description: 3to4D: Animate any 3D object with text prompts, preserving visual quality and achieving realistic motion!

item.title: VideoMaker: Zero-shot Customized Video Generation with the Inherent Force of Video Diffusion Models
item.description: VideoMaker achieves high-fidelity zero-shot customized video generation by cleverly harnessing the inherent power of video diffusion models, eliminating the need for extra feature extraction and injec…

item.title: Distilled Decoding 1: One-step Sampling of Image Auto-regressive Models with Flow Matching
item.description: Distilled Decoding (DD) drastically speeds up image generation from autoregressive models by using flow matching to enable one-step sampling, achieving significant speedups while maintaining acceptabl…

item.title: CLEAR: Conv-Like Linearization Revs Pre-Trained Diffusion Transformers Up
item.description: CLEAR: Conv-Like Linearization boosts pre-trained Diffusion Transformers, achieving 6.3x faster 8K image generation with minimal quality loss.

item.title: Affordance-Aware Object Insertion via Mask-Aware Dual Diffusion
item.description: Affordance-Aware Object Insertion uses a novel Mask-Aware Dual Diffusion model & SAM-FB dataset to realistically place objects in scenes, considering contextual relationships.

item.title: Parallelized Autoregressive Visual Generation
item.description: Boosting autoregressive visual generation speed by 3.6-9.5x, this research introduces parallel processing while preserving model simplicity and generation quality.

item.title: UIP2P: Unsupervised Instruction-based Image Editing via Cycle Edit Consistency
item.description: UIP2P: Unsupervised instruction-based image editing achieves high-fidelity edits by enforcing Cycle Edit Consistency, eliminating the need for ground-truth data.

item.title: FashionComposer: Compositional Fashion Image Generation
item.description: FashionComposer revolutionizes fashion image creation through flexible composition of garments, faces, and poses.

item.title: ChatDiT: A Training-Free Baseline for Task-Agnostic Free-Form Chatting with Diffusion Transformers
item.description: ChatDiT enables zero-shot, multi-turn image generation using pretrained diffusion transformers and a novel multi-agent framework.

item.title: ColorFlow: Retrieval-Augmented Image Sequence Colorization
item.description: ColorFlow, a new AI model, accurately colorizes black-and-white image sequences while preserving character identity.

item.title: BrushEdit: All-In-One Image Inpainting and Editing
item.description: BrushEdit revolutionizes interactive image editing with instructions & inpainting.

item.title: Prompt2Perturb (P2P): Text-Guided Diffusion-Based Adversarial Attacks on Breast Ultrasound Images
item.description: New attack fools breast ultrasound AI using subtle text prompts.

item.title: Arbitrary-steps Image Super-resolution via Diffusion Inversion
item.description: InvSR: a novel image super-resolution technique using diffusion inversion, enabling flexible sampling steps for efficient and high-fidelity results.

item.title: DisPose: Disentangling Pose Guidance for Controllable Human Image Animation
item.description: DisPose disentangles pose guidance for controllable human image animation, generating diverse animations while preserving appearance consistency using only sparse skeleton pose input, eliminating the …

item.title: EasyRef: Omni-Generalized Group Image Reference for Diffusion Models via Multimodal LLM
item.description: EasyRef uses multimodal LLMs to generate images from multiple references, overcoming limitations of prior methods by capturing consistent visual elements and offering improved zero-shot generalization…

item.title: FluxSpace: Disentangled Semantic Editing in Rectified Flow Transformers
item.description: Edit images precisely with AI, no masks needed!

item.title: FreeScale: Unleashing the Resolution of Diffusion Models via Tuning-Free Scale Fusion
item.description: FreeScale generates stunning 8K images and high-fidelity videos without retraining.

item.title: LoRACLR: Contrastive Adaptation for Customization of Diffusion Models
item.description: LoRACLR merges multiple LoRA models for high-fidelity multi-concept image generation, using a contrastive objective to ensure concept distinctiveness and prevent interference.

item.title: DiffSensei: Bridging Multi-Modal LLMs and Diffusion Models for Customized Manga Generation
item.description: DiffSensei: A new framework generates customized manga with dynamic multi-character control using multi-modal LLMs and diffusion models, outperforming existing methods.

item.title: Evaluation Agent: Efficient and Promptable Evaluation Framework for Visual Generative Models
item.description: Introducing Evaluation Agent, a faster, more flexible human-like framework for evaluating visual generative AI.

item.title: FireFlow: Fast Inversion of Rectified Flow for Image Semantic Editing
item.description: FireFlow makes editing images faster and better.

item.title: FiVA: Fine-grained Visual Attribute Dataset for Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: FiVA dataset and its adaptation framework enable unprecedented fine-grained control over visual attributes in text-to-image generation, empowering users to craft highly customized images.

item.title: STIV: Scalable Text and Image Conditioned Video Generation
item.description: STIV: A novel, scalable method for text and image-conditioned video generation, systematically improving model architectures, training, and data curation for superior performance.

item.title: UniReal: Universal Image Generation and Editing via Learning Real-world Dynamics
item.description: UniReal: a universal framework for image generation and editing, unifying diverse tasks via learning real-world dynamics from video data, achieving highly realistic and versatile results.

item.title: AnyDressing: Customizable Multi-Garment Virtual Dressing via Latent Diffusion Models
item.description: AnyDressing: Customizable multi-garment virtual dressing via a novel latent diffusion model!

item.title: Hidden in the Noise: Two-Stage Robust Watermarking for Images
item.description: WIND: A novel, distortion-free image watermarking method leveraging diffusion models’ initial noise for robust AI-generated content authentication.

item.title: HumanEdit: A High-Quality Human-Rewarded Dataset for Instruction-based Image Editing
item.description: HumanEdit: A new human-rewarded dataset revolutionizes instruction-based image editing by providing high-quality, diverse image pairs with detailed instructions, enabling precise model evaluation and …

item.title: Infinity: Scaling Bitwise AutoRegressive Modeling for High-Resolution Image Synthesis
item.description: Infinity, a novel bitwise autoregressive model, sets new records in high-resolution image synthesis, outperforming top diffusion models in speed and quality.

item.title: SwiftEdit: Lightning Fast Text-Guided Image Editing via One-Step Diffusion
item.description: SwiftEdit achieves lightning-fast, high-quality text-guided image editing in just 0.23 seconds via a novel one-step diffusion process.

item.title: ZipAR: Accelerating Autoregressive Image Generation through Spatial Locality
item.description: ZipAR accelerates autoregressive image generation by up to 91% through parallel decoding leveraging spatial locality in images, making high-resolution image generation significantly faster.

item.title: CleanDIFT: Diffusion Features without Noise
item.description: CleanDIFT revolutionizes diffusion feature extraction by leveraging clean images and a lightweight fine-tuning method, significantly boosting performance across various tasks without noise or timestep…

item.title: Imagine360: Immersive 360 Video Generation from Perspective Anchor
item.description: Imagine360: Generating immersive 360Â° videos from perspective videos, improving quality and accessibility of 360Â° content creation.

item.title: MV-Adapter: Multi-view Consistent Image Generation Made Easy
item.description: MV-Adapter easily transforms existing image generators into multi-view consistent image generators, improving efficiency and adaptability.

item.title: NVComposer: Boosting Generative Novel View Synthesis with Multiple Sparse and Unposed Images
item.description: NVComposer: A novel generative NVS model boosts synthesis quality by implicitly inferring spatial relationships from multiple sparse, unposed images, eliminating reliance on external alignment.

item.title: Scaling Image Tokenizers with Grouped Spherical Quantization
item.description: GSQ-GAN, a novel image tokenizer, achieves superior reconstruction quality with 16x downsampling using grouped spherical quantization, enabling efficient scaling for high-fidelity image generation.

item.title: SNOOPI: Supercharged One-step Diffusion Distillation with Proper Guidance
item.description: SNOOPI supercharges one-step diffusion model distillation with enhanced guidance, achieving state-of-the-art performance by stabilizing training and enabling negative prompt control.

item.title: Negative Token Merging: Image-based Adversarial Feature Guidance
item.description: NegToMe: Image-based adversarial guidance improves image generation diversity and reduces similarity to copyrighted content without training, simply by using images instead of negative text prompts.

item.title: NitroFusion: High-Fidelity Single-Step Diffusion through Dynamic Adversarial Training
item.description: NitroFusion achieves high-fidelity single-step image generation using a dynamic adversarial training approach with a specialized discriminator pool, dramatically improving speed and quality.

item.title: Switti: Designing Scale-Wise Transformers for Text-to-Image Synthesis
item.description: SWITTI: a novel scale-wise transformer achieves 7x faster text-to-image generation than state-of-the-art diffusion models, while maintaining competitive image quality.

item.title: TinyFusion: Diffusion Transformers Learned Shallow
item.description: TinyFusion, a novel learnable depth pruning method, crafts efficient shallow diffusion transformers with superior post-fine-tuning performance, achieving a 2x speedup with less than 7% of the original…

item.title: Open-Sora Plan: Open-Source Large Video Generation Model
item.description: Open-Sora Plan introduces an open-source large video generation model capable of producing high-resolution videos with long durations, based on various user inputs.

item.title: FAM Diffusion: Frequency and Attention Modulation for High-Resolution Image Generation with Stable Diffusion
item.description: FAM Diffusion: Generate high-res images seamlessly from pre-trained diffusion models, solving structural and texture inconsistencies without retraining!

item.title: ROICtrl: Boosting Instance Control for Visual Generation
item.description: ROICtrl boosts visual generation’s instance control by using regional instance control via ROI-Align and a new ROI-Unpool operation, resulting in precise regional control and high efficiency.

item.title: TryOffDiff: Virtual-Try-Off via High-Fidelity Garment Reconstruction using Diffusion Models
item.description: TryOffDiff generates realistic garment images from single photos, solving virtual try-on limitations.

item.title: AnchorCrafter: Animate CyberAnchors Saling Your Products via Human-Object Interacting Video Generation
item.description: AnchorCrafter animates cyber-anchors selling products via human-object interacting video generation, achieving high visual fidelity and controllable interactions.

item.title: ChatGen: Automatic Text-to-Image Generation From FreeStyle Chatting
item.description: ChatGen-Evo automates text-to-image generation from freestyle chatting, simplifying the process and significantly improving performance over existing methods.

item.title: Collaborative Decoding Makes Visual Auto-Regressive Modeling Efficient
item.description: Collaborative Decoding (CoDe) dramatically boosts visual auto-regressive model efficiency.

item.title: DreamCache: Finetuning-Free Lightweight Personalized Image Generation via Feature Caching
item.description: DreamCache enables efficient, high-quality personalized image generation without finetuning by caching reference image features and using lightweight conditioning adapters.

item.title: DreamMix: Decoupling Object Attributes for Enhanced Editability in Customized Image Inpainting
item.description: DreamMix enhances image inpainting by disentangling object attributes for precise editing, enabling both identity preservation and flexible text-driven modifications.

item.title: Identity-Preserving Text-to-Video Generation by Frequency Decomposition
item.description: ConsisID achieves high-quality, identity-preserving text-to-video generation using a tuning-free diffusion transformer model that leverages frequency decomposition for effective identity control.

item.title: Omegance: A Single Parameter for Various Granularities in Diffusion-Based Synthesis
item.description: Omegance: One parameter precisely controls image detail in diffusion models, enabling flexible granularity adjustments without model changes or retraining.

item.title: Controllable Human Image Generation with Personalized Multi-Garments
item.description: BootComp: generate realistic human images wearing multiple garments using a novel synthetic data pipeline & diffusion model, enabling diverse applications like virtual try-on.

item.title: Factorized Visual Tokenization and Generation
item.description: FQGAN revitalizes image generation by introducing Factorized Quantization, enabling scalable and stable visual tokenization with state-of-the-art performance.

item.title: One Diffusion to Generate Them All
item.description: OneDiffusion: A single diffusion model masters image synthesis & understanding across diverse tasks, from text-to-image to depth estimation, pushing the boundaries of AI.

item.title: Pathways on the Image Manifold: Image Editing via Video Generation
item.description: Image editing is revolutionized by Frame2Frame, which uses video generation to produce seamless and accurate edits, preserving image fidelity.

item.title: Visual Counter Turing Test (VCT^2): Discovering the Challenges for AI-Generated Image Detection and Introducing Visual AI Index (V_AI)
item.description: New benchmark VCTÂ² reveals limitations of AI-generated image detectors; Visual AI Index (VAI) provides a robust evaluation framework.

item.title: Large-Scale Text-to-Image Model with Inpainting is a Zero-Shot Subject-Driven Image Generator
item.description: Diptych Prompting: a novel zero-shot subject-driven image generator leveraging large-scale text-to-image models and inpainting for precise subject alignment and high-quality image synthesis.

item.title: Morph: A Motion-free Physics Optimization Framework for Human Motion Generation
item.description: Morph: a novel motion-free physics optimization framework drastically enhances human motion generation’s physical plausibility using synthetic data, achieving state-of-the-art quality.

item.title: OminiControl: Minimal and Universal Control for Diffusion Transformer
item.description: OminiControl: A minimal, universal framework efficiently integrates image conditions into diffusion transformers, enabling diverse and precise control over image generation.

item.title: Style-Friendly SNR Sampler for Style-Driven Generation
item.description: Style-friendly SNR sampler biases diffusion model training towards higher noise levels, enabling it to learn and generate images with higher style fidelity.

item.title: TEXGen: a Generative Diffusion Model for Mesh Textures
item.description: TEXGen: A groundbreaking generative diffusion model creates high-resolution 3D mesh textures directly from text and image prompts, exceeding prior methods in quality and efficiency.

item.title: MyTimeMachine: Personalized Facial Age Transformation
item.description: MyTimeMachine personalizes facial age transformation using just 50 personal photos, outperforming existing methods by generating re-aged faces that closely match a person’s actual appearance at variou…

item.title: Stable Flow: Vital Layers for Training-Free Image Editing
item.description: Stable Flow achieves diverse, consistent image editing without training by strategically injecting source image features into specific ‘vital’ layers of a diffusion transformer model. This training-f…

item.title: VBench++: Comprehensive and Versatile Benchmark Suite for Video Generative Models
item.description: VBench++: A new benchmark suite meticulously evaluates video generative models across 16 diverse dimensions, aligning with human perception for improved model development and fairer comparisons.

item.title: Stylecodes: Encoding Stylistic Information For Image Generation
item.description: StyleCodes enables easy style sharing for image generation by encoding styles as compact strings, enhancing control and collaboration while minimizing quality loss.

item.title: Continuous Speculative Decoding for Autoregressive Image Generation
item.description: Researchers have developed Continuous Speculative Decoding, boosting autoregressive image generation speed by up to 2.33x while maintaining image quality.

item.title: FitDiT: Advancing the Authentic Garment Details for High-fidelity Virtual Try-on
item.description: FitDiT boosts virtual try-on realism by enhancing garment details via Diffusion Transformers, improving texture and size accuracy for high-fidelity virtual fashion.

item.title: MagicQuill: An Intelligent Interactive Image Editing System
item.description: MagicQuill: an intelligent interactive image editing system enabling intuitive, precise image edits via brushstrokes and real-time intent prediction by a multimodal LLM.

item.title: Add-it: Training-Free Object Insertion in Images With Pretrained Diffusion Models
item.description: Add-it: Training-free object insertion in images using pretrained diffusion models by cleverly balancing information from the scene, text prompt, and generated image, achieving state-of-the-art result…

item.title: Edify Image: High-Quality Image Generation with Pixel Space Laplacian Diffusion Models
item.description: Edify Image: groundbreaking pixel-perfect photorealistic image generation using cascaded pixel-space diffusion models with a novel Laplacian diffusion process, enabling diverse applications including …

item.title: OmniEdit: Building Image Editing Generalist Models Through Specialist Supervision
item.description: OmniEdit, a novel instruction-based image editing model, surpasses existing methods by leveraging specialist supervision and high-quality data, achieving superior performance across diverse editing ta…

item.title: StdGEN: Semantic-Decomposed 3D Character Generation from Single Images
item.description: StdGEN: Generate high-quality, semantically decomposed 3D characters from a single image in minutes, enabling flexible customization for various applications.

item.title: SG-I2V: Self-Guided Trajectory Control in Image-to-Video Generation
item.description: SG-I2V: Zero-shot controllable image-to-video generation using a self-guided approach that leverages pre-trained models for precise object and camera motion control.

item.title: SVDQunat: Absorbing Outliers by Low-Rank Components for 4-Bit Diffusion Models
item.description: SVDQuant boosts 4-bit diffusion models by absorbing outliers via low-rank components, achieving 3.5x memory reduction and 3x speedup on 12B parameter models.

item.title: Training-free Regional Prompting for Diffusion Transformers
item.description: Training-free Regional Prompting for FLUX boosts compositional text-to-image generation by cleverly manipulating attention mechanisms, achieving fine-grained control without retraining.

item.title: Constant Acceleration Flow
item.description: Constant Acceleration Flow (CAF) dramatically speeds up diffusion model generation by using a constant acceleration equation, outperforming state-of-the-art methods with improved accuracy and few-step…

item.title: Randomized Autoregressive Visual Generation
item.description: Randomized Autoregressive Modeling (RAR) sets a new state-of-the-art in image generation by cleverly introducing randomness during training to improve the model’s ability to learn from bidirectional c…

item.title: In-Context LoRA for Diffusion Transformers
item.description: In-Context LoRA empowers existing text-to-image models for high-fidelity multi-image generation by simply concatenating images and using minimal task-specific LoRA tuning.

item.title: HelloMeme: Integrating Spatial Knitting Attentions to Embed High-Level and Fidelity-Rich Conditions in Diffusion Models
item.description: HelloMeme enhances text-to-image models by integrating spatial knitting attentions, enabling high-fidelity meme video generation while preserving model generalization.
